title: Mathematics Instructional Design Using VR-Based Eye-Tracking and Deep Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic educational technology and secondary mathematics pedagogy, with VR technology experience
context.additional_context: VR-based customized math lesson design competency development program for pre-service and in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can explain methods to assess cognitive load by analyzing eye-tracking data in VR environments.
Learners can demonstrate the impact of deep learning-based feedback systems on improving mathematical concept comprehension using empirical data.
Learners can design adaptive mathematics education scenarios based on the correlation between gaze concentration and academic achievement.

resources: CNN (Convolutional Neural Network) Training GPU Server

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
